org.apache.struts.taglib
Class IfParameterEqualsTag

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
        |
        +--org.apache.struts.taglib.IfParameterEqualsTag
public class IfParameterEqualsTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport

Conditionally include the body of this tag if the specified parameter matches the specified value.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $ $Date: 2000/08/01 20:03:33 $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan
See Also:
